General.Name: Solar Co. S.A.
General.Description: Solar Company S.A. offers women's clothing in Poland and internationally. The company offers dresses, tops, tunics, sweaters, blouses, skirts, pants, blazers, jackets, coats, shirts, and denims; and accessories, such as jewelry, shawls, neckerchief, headwears, bags, and belts. It operates a network of 55 company's operated stores, 8 outlet stores, partner stores, and 19 franchise stores in Germany and one franchise store in Poland, as well as through an online store. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Poznan, Poland.
